headline: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) Debuts eSR-19 Rocket Motor in Missile Defense Test
summary: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) recently experienced a share price increase of about 6% over the past month, coinciding with significant developments that may have impacted market sentiment. The company introduced the eSR-19, an advanced rocket motor designed for missile defense applications, which was successfully tested, potentially boosting investor confidence. Furthermore, a dividend increase approved by the Board might have appealed to income-focused investors. While market conditions...
